name: Kayzo
description:
'''Hayden Capuozzo''' (born October 8, 1991), better known by his stage name '''Kayzo''', is an American DJ based in [[Los Angeles]], [[California]]. He is best known for remixing songs and incorporating [[trap music (EDM)|trap]] and [[hardstyle]] genres into his remixes. His collaboration with Riot, "Wake Up", received more than 200,000 plays in less than 24 hours.

Kayzo is also the founder of Welcome Records.
